ygData.subject: Re: How do you feel?
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree it is hard but c3 and c2 truly unbalance the game a young chanter had no chance to group.  No one needed you it also took away from bards as mana
ygData.messageBody:
I agree it is hard but c3 and c2 truly unbalance the game a young
chanter had no chance to group. No one needed you it also took away
from bards as mana batteries. I am glad they balanced it. The
reason you are upset with your toon is its off the crack and feeling
the shock of withdrawal. Suck it up and learn to play your toon.
You will be glad you did later. Its easy to play any class if its
twinked out or buffed to the hilt. Find a class you like buck naked
and unbuffed thats where you will be happy in the long haul. For me
it was the Monk and Beastlord. A good place to try all the classes is
on the test server do the test buff and bam your 25 with decent gear.
PS. For those of you with an eye for grammer and
spelling, what can I say but enjoy =O` /wink


My 2 copper Hawg
